relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops or rubs
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, distended and firm, tender to palpation in right lower quadrant (RLQ) with guarding; no palpable masses, no hernias palpated
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused
